TopicTitle: Is there a replacement to the tracking station?

Articles.Content: I desperatley need a mod or a hack that will act as a tracking station so I can recover , terminate vessels, ect. Some mod has been really screwing with my game and nobody can seem to help me fix it.
This request for an Add-on has been moved to General Add-on Affairs. For reference, lextacy's Tracking Station issues are described in this thread.
